author: Lon.TV
description:
Sign up for a Plex Pass: http://lon.tv/plexpass (compensated affilate link) - I found an old Sony laptop that served as my Plex media server for a number of years before I upgraded to a NAS. In this video I'll take you on a journey through each of my Plex servers and why I upgraded them. See all of my Plex content: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIvqJPAmMooCKOHieLdi3I7o and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
01:39 - My First Plex Server - Sony Vaio Laptop
02:14 - Intel Quicksync Feature Tutorial
04:36 - WD My Cloud PR2100 - 2017
06:47 - Current Server: Beelink ME NAS - https://lon.tv/z0sl5 (aff link)
07:58 - Transcoding on a GPU?
09:03 - Why I like Docker for Serving in 2025
10:30 - Cheap Server Recommendation - https://lon.tv/v6yhd (aff link)

title: Plex Server Upgrades: When should you upgrade hardware? Here's my server journey
